_header: Beware man I come as thief
Note:
Cf. Owst (1933)
XOwst, Gerald Robert. Literature and Pulpit in Medieval England. Cambridge: UP, 1933, 532.
_description: A tag in John Grimestone’s sermon notes — one couplet

NLS18721.Transcription:
Be war man I come as þefTo reuen þi life þat is
                    þe lef
